page.title: 11LHANBRYDE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {RECREATION:LHANBRYDE VILLAGE HALL Caretaker's weekly routine: Mr.Costello usually starts work at 8am His finishing time varies according to the daily requirements. He attends the hall 30 to 35 times a week depending on the hall programme. All age groups are catered for in the variety of activities available. These include playgroup for pre-school-aged children,mother-and-toddler group, Highland dancing,junior and senior badminton,youth{clubs,}archery,discos, disabled people's club,keep-fit and a thriving pensioners'club.Fund-raising events are held by local associations as well as committee meetings and many competitions with entries from far and near. The hall is used as the local rent- collecting office,saving a journey of 5 miles to the nearest district office
